# ChangeLog

All notable changes are documented in this file using the [Keep a CHANGELOG](https://keepachangelog.com/) principles.

## [2.0.0] - 2020-07-25

### Removed

* The `ParentConnectingVisitor` has been removed (it should have been marked as `@internal`)

## [1.0.0] - 2020-07-22

* Initial release
